title: Seeing a horse in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Horses are also mentioned in the Qur’an and Sunnah, and our Holy Prophet urged us to teach our children to ride horses, and through gptafser.com/ we will tell you in detail about the interpretation of this dream. Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees that she is buying a horse, this is an indication of the good that will happen in her life. Whether on a practical or social level. And if she sees in her dream that she is riding a horse, this is good news that she will marry a good, prestige man. If a horse sees water in a dream, this means that he has achieved the thing that he had in mind. Sometimes she sees in her dream a black horse. It expresses the crises that she is going through, and God knows best. And if she sees that she is riding a horse, this means that this girl will reach a prominent position. Seeing a dowry indicates her marriage to a brave and good-natured person. When she sees a dead or sick horse in her dream, this is a sign that she will get rid of One of the crises that she was going through. Seeing a horse in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her marriage to a person who is righteous in religion and has a beautiful appearance. Buying a horse or receiving it as a gift indicates a benefit that this girl will get in the near future, God willing. See also: The horse In a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a horse in a dream for a married woman is an omen for her that she will have a lot of good or close inheritance. When a married woman sees more than one horse in her dream, this indicates the family stability that the woman enjoys and the abundance of her offspring. Seeing a white horse in a dream for a married woman indicates the blessing of money. Also, seeing a black horse indicates the recovery of her sick husband, God willing. Also, seeing a black horse running indicates that her husband is traveling to obtain a lot of money. At other times, seeing a black horse indicates Honoring children and overcoming crises, and God knows best. Also, seeing a horse with one eye indicates that she is going through a financial crisis, so he must insist on seeking forgiveness. Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream for a divorced womanWhen a divorced woman sees a horse in her dream, this is a sign that her wishes are coming true, and how special she is, And more than that. Seeing white horses in a dream indicates a benefit that this woman will receive. If she sees in her dream that she wants to get close to the horse, this indicates her need for people close to her to overcome the adversity that she is going through. While seeing her riding a horse in a dream It is a good omen that she will marry again to a good husband soon. And if she sees that she is feeding a horse in her dream, this indicates this woman’s abundance of breadth and stability. Likewise, the divorced woman who sees a black horse in her dream is a good omen for her, especially if she sees that she is raising it. And the divorced women who She rides a horse in her dream, which shows the end of the psychological crisis she is going through as a result of the divorce. This dream also represents that she is practicing something else, such as a hobby or something else, perhaps compensating for her failure in her married life. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a raging horse. Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream for a man What it means is if a man sees a horse in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing an old house in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an old house in a dream or a dream through the vision site roy2a.com, seeing a person from an old house in a dream or seeing that he has returned to his old previous home may prompt him to confuse and wonder about the meaning of this vision and what it expresses, and seeing the old house has many mysterious clues and interpreters in interpreting the vision of the old house in a dream according to the fortune teller's condition and circumstances and whether the man or woman is single, married, pregnant or divorced. Today, through the vision site, we will deal with the interpretation of seeing the old house in a dream in detail based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq. So follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing an old house in a dream for Ibn Sirin: Seeing an old house in a dream indicates that the dreamer will go through a health crisis or indicates that he is a negligent and careless person. Seeing a fire in an old house indicates that the dreamer hears unpleasant news and goes through sad events. Seeing confusion in an old house in a dream is a financial distress that the viewer suffers from or an illness that afflicts him. Seeing the discovery of an old house in a dream indicates the positive things that will happen in the dreamer's life. Seeing a visit to an old house in a dream indicates good things and good news that will reach the fortuneteller. See also: Interpretation of seeing an old workplace in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing an old house in a dream for a man: Seeing a man living in an old house in a dream shows that he will face financial difficulties, but he will overcome them quickly. A man saw that he built a house and then found it old in a dream indicates his fruitless effort or loss in a project or trade. Seeing a man buying an old house in a dream indicates his marriage to a bad woman with whom he will suffer and face problems because of her. Seeing a man selling an old house in a dream is getting rid of The crises and difficulties he faced, and facilitating his affairs because they were difficult. Seeing a man breaking into an old house in a dream announces that he will divorce his wife, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing an abandoned house in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing an old house in a dream for a single woman: Seeing in a dream an unmarried woman wandering around an old house indicates an emotional attachment because of which she will face many problems and will have to review herself and think carefully before completing them. Seeing a single woman as the owner of an old house in a dream indicates her marriage to a person suffering from difficult financial conditions. Seeing an unmarried woman in an old house with many ruins indicates the loss of a close friend from her, and God knows best. Seeing a single woman trying to repair an old house shows that he is trying to solve the emotional problems he faces. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream returning to her old house indicates a failure in her emotional life due to the many problems she will go through. See also: Interpretation of seeing a new house in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing an old house in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman living in an old house in a dream indicates the difficulty of her financial matters and her home or the crises her husband faces in his work. Seeing a married woman

And think carefully before completing it. Seeing a single woman as the owner of an old house in a dream indicates her marriage to a person suffering from difficult financial circumstances. Married: Seeing a married woman living in an old house in a dream indicates the difficulty of financial matters for her and her home or the crises that her husband faces at his work. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about crying with tears according to Ibn Sirin and leading scholars?

preview.html: What you do not know about the important interpretations of seeing tears in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about crying with tears is a common dream among people, and many of them are very concerned about this dream, but crying in a dream can be good or it can be annoying. In this article, you will learn about cases of crying in a dream and the interpretation of cases of crying in a dream. Tears in a dream Seeing tears in a dream has many cases, so the dreamer can see tears accompanying crying without sound. As for seeing tears in a dream accompanied by intense crying and loud screaming, this indicates The presence of problems in the dreamer’s life. A wife who sees her dead husband’s tears indicates the husband’s dissatisfaction with his wife. Because of some things she does in her life. As for the husband seeing his deceased wife’s tears, this indicates her dissatisfaction with him. Because of the actions he committed against her in her life. The case of seeing a dead mother crying in a dream because of her love and satisfaction with the person she sees. What is the interpretation of tears in a dream for a single woman? The interpretation of tears in a dream for a single girl is a happy thing if the tears are not accompanied by screaming and lamentation, as these tears In a dream, it indicates joy and happiness, receiving beautiful news at the first opportunity, and finally the worries and sorrows of this girl. Interpretation of tears in a dream for an unmarried girl: If tears are accompanied by screaming and wailing, this indicates the presence of misfortunes in the life of this unmarried girl and the presence of problems in her real life. Website An Egyptian specialist who includes a group of leading translators of dreams and visions in the Arab world. Seeing tears in a dream. Interpretation of seeing tears in a dream. If the dreamer is a man, this indicates the abundance of sustenance and the great good that will happen to that person in reality. A man’s dream of tears if tears are accompanied by intense crying, This indicates the presence of problems in a man’s life. The interpretation of seeing tears with blood indicates that the dreamer feels intense remorse for an act committed in real life. The interpretation of a married woman’s tears indicates freedom from anxiety and staying away from problems. The sign of tears indicates, along with the intense crying of a married woman , to the emergence of problems for her husband and his extreme poverty. What do the tears of the dead appear in a dream? The interpretation of the tears of the dead in a dream varies depending on the state of tears and crying in the dream, and we will explain this as follows: If the tears of the dead in a dream are accompanied by intense crying, this indicates a lack of comfort. For the dead person in the afterlife and subjecting him to severe torture. If he sees a dead person crying a lot in a dream, then he must give alms a lot to get rid of the torment that he will be exposed to after that. The interpretation of the tears of a dead person in a dream, if they are accompanied by the light of crying without screaming or sound, indicates great joy and comfort. Complete in the afterlife. Some scholars interpret the light of the dead person crying in a dream as longing for the dead person, love for him, and the inability to let go of him. Interpretation of seeing a dead father crying in a dream with resentment and anger at the person who sees him. Interpretation of a dream about tears. Scientists differed in the interpretation of tears in dreams. Some of them interpreted tears as happiness and joy in reality, and some of them interpreted blood

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing a butterfly in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi?

preview.html: What is the full interpretation of seeing a butterfly in a dream? A butterfly is one of the flying insects that is often found in fields, green places, and flower areas. Seeing a butterfly in a full dream is one of the visions that confuses a person. Dreamer, we have collected for you everything today, correct and logical interpretations of the butterfly symbol in a complete dream, and we will collect for you the complete meaning of the white butterfly in a dream, as well as the interpretation of seeing a butterfly in a camel’s dream. Dream books for elderly, married and pregnant women, as well as men, were created by high-level scientists to interpret visions and dreams. If you are interested in knowing the complete interpretation of seeing a butterfly in a dream, then you should read the article. What is the interpretation of seeing a butterfly by Imam al-Sadiq? Imam al-Sadiq talks about a man who sees a butterfly in a dream whole, for a woman in his decision, and a butterfly in a man’s dream is considered a sign of kindness, support and happiness. The butterfly In a dream, it indicates that you will earn a lot and travel, and God knows best. Then, seeing a white butterfly in a complete dream is one of the thankful dreams that indicate goodness and happiness, and God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of seeing insects in a complete dream? What is the interpretation of seeing a butterfly according to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin speaks Sirin talks about killing a yellow butterfly in a dream, indicating that the dreamer has recovered from the disease. Seeing a gray butterfly is a sign of upcoming worries and problems in the dreamer’s future life, and God knows best. Seeing a black butterfly in the dreamer is an unpleasant dream and does not indicate a good situation for him. And God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of seeing lice in a dream and its meaning? Why does a man dream of a butterfly? Seeing a white butterfly in a dream shows him a close marriage to a girl who has a lot of beauty. In addition, seeing butterflies in a dream is full of benign visions that indicate goodness and happiness, and hearing Good news, and God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of seeing bees in a dream full of men and women? Why dream of a butterfly for a single woman? The presence of a whole white butterfly in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates an imminent marriage, and God knows best. Also, seeing butterflies that differ in color from white indicates temptation and problems In the dreamer's life.And seeing a butterfly with a bright and shiny color, this is interpreted as the fact that the girl likes to pay attention to her appearance and appearance, and God knows best.See also: Why dream of seeing an insecticide in a dream full?Why does a married woman dream of a butterfly?Seeing a butterfly in a dream full of a married woman says She is waiting for important and happy news in her life, and God knows best. To dream of a married butterfly, a yellow butterfly, is a sign that there is a problem between her and her husband. Seeing a butterfly on the marital bed in a married woman’s dream indicates her upcoming pregnancy, and God knows best. Why does a butterfly dream in a pregnant woman’s dream? Vision Full pregnant white butterflies in a dream always mean goodness and happiness. Seeing a fully pregnant butterfly in a dream is an indication of the time of her birth. Seeing an unknown colorless butterfly in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that the baby is male and God knows what is in the womb. See also: Why

title: Interpretation of smallpox in a dream. Meaning of smallpox in a dream

preview.html: Contents: I dreamed that I was infected with goose, a rash in a dream, a married woman, pregnant, diabetic, sick, I dreamed that I was infected with smallpox. The meaning of smallpox and illness in a dreamA dream of smallpox for someone who sees it in a dream is interpreted as an increase in money for the dreamer, as well as any other wounds On the body it is interpreted as an increase in money. Whoever sees that he has contracted chickenpox in a dream, his wealth will increase, and if he sees that one of his sons has contracted chickenpox, the credit will go to his son in return. After all, a dream of smallpox or seeing smallpox is interpreted In a dream it is a debt to the dreamer, but he does not have any claims from them. Illness in a dream indicates that you will have a lot of trouble in the future or that a family member will suffer from an illness. If the dreamer sees that he is sick, then he should take care of himself. A person's illness in a dream is interpreted as a victory over his enemies. If the dreamer is going through a crisis or is seriously going through and sees himself sick in the dream, then he should expect that he will overcome his crisis peacefully. If one of your family members is sick or pale, every dreamer should know that accidents will happen to him suddenly and not unexpectedly. But if he sees in his dream that someone he does not know is infected with the disease, the disease will return to him, and whoever sees in his dream that his father is sick will suffer from a severe headache. If the dreamer is a woman and dreams that she is sick, this foretells that she is facing an unexpected event that causes her despair and sadness and makes her tense and sad. His wife. Illness in a dream can indicate the door of abundant nourishment that will come to a person from where he does not know, and in many cases it is also interpreted as love. If you see an illness in your dream, this warns you that you will face problems in the future or that a member of your family will become ill. But if you dream that you are impatient, then you should pay close attention to yourself. Other times, one's illness in a dream is interpreted as a victory over one's enemies. But if you are in distress and dream that you are sick, expect that you will overcome your crisis peacefully. If in a dream you see a member of your family sick or pale, then you should know that some accident will happen to you suddenly and you do not expect it, but if you see someone you do not know who has fallen ill. It will return to the dreamer, and whoever sees in a dream that his father is sick will get a headache because it is said that it is the head instead of the father. If you are a woman and dream that you are sick, this portends that you may face an unexpected incident that will cause you a bout of despair and make you withdrawn and sad, and a man’s illness in a dream is Isolation from his wife. Sometimes illness in a dream is interpreted as abundant money that will come to you from a door you do not know, and sometimes it is interpreted as love, smallpox in a dream, debts and claims. It has been said: Smallpox means money, so whoever sees that it is small, it means an increase in his money. If he sees that his son has jaundice, then the money will go to his son, as well as the wounds on the body, the money will increase. If he sees wounds on his body from which his hand falls, this will benefit him and not harm him. If you dream of others being infected with smallpox, you will be afflicted with a sudden disease that will shock you and may be contagious.

It has been said: Smallpox means money, so whoever sees that it is small, it means an increase in his money. If he sees that his son has jaundice, then the money will go to his son, as well as the wounds on the body, the money will increase. If he sees wounds on his body from which his hand falls, this will benefit him and not harm him. If you dream of others being infected with smallpox, you will be afflicted with a sudden disease that will shock you and may be contagious.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing strong winds and light in a dream

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the appearance of wood in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing wood in a dream Wood occupies a large place in our daily lives as it has many uses and it is impossible for a house to be without wood as a raw material or even as manufactured materials such as a table, a closet and even wood. The boards used in the family and the interpretations of this topic differ for many reasons, as there is wood in dreams in different colors such as red and black, in addition to the dreamer's practices towards this wood in the dream such as cutting or manufacturing. Interpretation of wood in a dream To get the correct interpretation, search Google for an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Ibn Sirin's interpretations become clear when you see wood in a dream. It clearly means hateful qualities such as the love of showing off good deeds in front of people for show - that is, for show - and hatred and hatred. Whoever sees that he is burning firewood in a dream, he will achieve great profits in his life through a person he does not know. If you see yourself or someone making wood in a dream, this means that this dreamer is intelligent, talented and wise and that in his dealings with other creatures he is wise and reasonable. Wood in a dream can mean that he is your enemy and if you break it, it symbolizes your victory over this enemy. Seeing red wood during a married woman's sleep is a harbinger of turmoil, and for black wood, it means calamities. Burning wood in a dream for a married woman is a divorce or loss of money. Al-Nabulsi sees that cutting wood is a defeat and defeat for predatory enemies. What is the interpretation of a dream about a wooden door? According to Ibn Sirin's interpretation, a wooden door is a sign of a person's righteousness and piety to God, and it can also mean protection and protection from the evil of fate. It can also be a sign of new friends and all of this falls within the framework of kindness that Ibn Sirin said. Interpretation of wood in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq The wooden ceiling in a dream indicates To an arrogant and arrogant person. If you see the cupboard or the cupboard empty, it indicates a state of despair, disappointment and the general bad psychological state that the dreamer suffers from. Interpretations of the dream of a wooden cupboard The appearance of a wooden cupboard in a dream in which children's toys are placed is evidence that the dreamer is a pure person with a pure heart and that he longs within himself for the days of previous childhood and needs loyal and loyal companions. About the dreamer's desire to own a car, and if not, it is simply an expression of enjoying peace in his home. The wooden cupboard is a reflection of the person's ambitions and high aspirations in life and his many desires, and in addition, the cupboard contains many clothes and luxurious things, which is greater evidence of overcoming these aspirations. The complete wardrobe is conclusive evidence of the wealth that a person possesses, whether that wealth is financial, mental or psychological. What is the interpretation of the wooden table in a dream? An unmarried girl who sees a wooden table and it is empty, this expresses a state of need for her, and this need may be due to emotional emptiness, or it may be a psychological or financial need due to need. The man who sits

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about fishing from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about catching fish: Fish is one of the delicious foods that many people prefer to eat in reality, but seeing it in a dream can bring with it bad or good signs, and this is determined according to the details of the dream and the state of the fortuneteller. We will talk about it in detail in this article. Interpretation of a dream about catching fish: If a person sees in his dream that he is catching a fish, he will hear good news and tidings and will receive many blessings and goodness in the very near future. Seeing fishing in a dream indicates the achievement of many goals for which a lot of effort has been made. Effort to achieve them. If a person sees in a dream that he is catching a fish in salt water, then there is a clear indication that he is committing immorality and great sins in reality, and he must stop and return to God and ask for forgiveness. I saw that I was catching a fish in a dream. If the dreamer dreams of catching fish from water If a married man dreams that he is fishing and finds pearls in it, then his wife will become pregnant and give birth to a male child. A dream about fishing from unclean water indicates the arrival of bad news and difficult times full of pressure and problems. Interpretation of a dream about catching fish by Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is catching a fish with a hook, this indicates that he is characterized by patience, wisdom, and good behavior in society. If a person sees in his dream an attempt to catch fish and it does not succeed, then there is a clear indication that serious disagreements will arise between him and an individual. his family, which will end in hostility. The dream of catching fish and surviving after leaving the water symbolizes the dreamer’s high status, gaining prestigious positions in his work, and earning a lot of money in the coming period. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is catching a colorful fish and its colors are attractive, this is a sign of changes Positivity in his life, especially on the material level that makes him comfortable and happy. Interpretation of a dream about catching fish for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is catching a fish inside her, this is a sign that good and happy news is coming and a life filled with many benefits and rewards in the coming days. The vision A big fish in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she will soon marry a suitable young man who can make her happy in the near future. If a non-relative girl sees in her dream that she is fishing, this is a sign that she will find a distinguished job from which she will obtain huge financial benefits. If a girl sees in her dream that she is fishing, this is a sign that she will find a distinguished job from which she will obtain huge financial benefits. Her dream is that she is catching a small fish, then this is a sign that she is sick and does not hear news that she is impatiently waiting for, which negatively affects her psychological state. Interpretation of a dream about catching fish for a married woman: If a woman dreams that she is catching a fish, then God will carry her soon and her pregnancy period will be free of fatigue or hardship. Whereas if she catches a big fish in her dream, this is a sign that her husband will get a profitable deal from which he will earn a lot of money in the coming days. If a married woman sees that she is catching fish from a pond with fresh water, this is a sign of

title: Interpretation of seeing a kiss on the neck in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I likeFansSubscribersFans The interpretation of seeing a kiss on the neck in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the date of her next relationship with a young man whom she loves and will live with him very happily, and the vision in a married woman’s dream symbolizes the passion she has for her husband and his interests, and announces to the man obtaining a promotion at work or obtaining a financial reward, The kiss of lust is a warning against lust and forbidden actions, and God knows best. What does a kiss on the neck mean for a single woman? It indicates the next date of her relationship with a young man she loves. The meaning of a woman kissing her husband on the neck? An example of their good relationship, the passion and compassion that unites them. What is the benefit of kissing those who are arguing with them? It indicates On their reconciliation and the passion that brings them together again. What is the purpose of sucking the neck of a single woman? It appears that he has a disease and will undergo surgery. Interpretation of someone kissing my neck for a single woman. Seeing a famous person kissing a girl around her neck is a sign that her engagement date is approaching. The vision suggests that the young woman will marry A young man whom she loves and lives happily with him. The vision announces that the girl will achieve a leading position in work and will have great power, then the girl will reap its fruits. The sight symbolizes a handsome man kissing a girlto hear exciting news. Seeing a stranger kissing a girl against her will and against her will means that she will be punished for her relationship with an unkind person. Appropriate. Kissing the neck lustfully in a dream warns that the girl’s lust will dominate the decision to associate with a disabled person. The vision warns that the girl is walking on the path of taboos. See also: - Interpretation of seeing a kiss or a kiss in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about someone I know kissing me. Seeing the manager kissing the dreamer while he Happy means that he will receive a financial reward or a promotion at work. A mother kisses her children in a dream. The vision symbolizes the mother’s understanding of the correct way to treat her children and knowing that they need her love and attention. A living father hugging his dreaming son indicates the advice he gets from him that helps him overcome Problems. Seeing someone the dreamer knows kissing him on the cheek symbolizes affection and care between them. Then seeing a celebrity kiss shows that the opinion is involved in all his affairs and is trying to get close to him. A woman’s unhappiness when her husband kisses her in a dream warns of a widening gap between them. Interpretation of a dream about a kiss on a married woman’s neck Kissing A wife to her husband in a dream is evidence of their good relationship and the tenderness and compassion that unite them. After that, when he sees the husband kissing his wife on the cheek, he expresses his interest in her and gives her the support she needs to succeed in her work. If a married woman sees a strange man kissing her in a dream, this indicates her need To feel love, comfort, and care for her husband. Kissing a mother who is still alive indicates her justice and obedience and does what she asks. Therefore, it symbolizes the opinion of kissing a dead mother for the rich good that she obtains. A woman who kisses an ugly man in a dream expresses an illness that befalls her and she lies in bed. For a long time. Interpretation of a dream about a kiss from a lover’s mouth: Kissing a lover on the mouth in a dream and there was a quarrel between them in reality, this indicates that you have ended

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a tree in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a tree in a dream through Al-Mazaqat According to leading Arab translators and scholars, seeing a tree generally indicates a person’s age, but this vision differs from one person to another, and dreaming of a tree has many concepts that are explained in detail and comprehensively through the interpretation of a tree in a dream for married, single, and pregnant women. Interpretation of a dream about seeing The Tree by Ibn SirinSeeing a tree in a dream, as interpreted by Ibn Sirin, indicates the blessing of God Almighty. Also, sitting under a tree in a dream is a sign of God’s satisfaction. The dreamer seeing as if he was planting a tree in the dream shows that she will give birth to a child. As for the dreamer who sees himself reaping Fruits other than those that bear fruit on the tree, this indicates that he took money unlawfully. As for the dreamer who dreams of the presence of many trees in the dream, this is a sign that he will become a leader. The tree in the house is evidence of the presence of a fire in the house, which will burn the dreamer. A tree in the house is a sign of trouble among the people of the house. A green tree symbolizes good deeds. Interpretation of a dream about cutting down a tree according to Nablus. Seeing a dry tree in a dream indicates the death of a sick person. Seeing human bark in a dream is a sign of blessings and goodness. Cutting down trees is evidence of cutting down parents and diseases. Interpretation of a dream about cutting down a tree by Ibn Shaheen. Seeing a cut down tree in a dream is a sign of death and the end of the reference to life. Seeing cutting down fruit trees in a dream is evidence of a rift between him and a noble man. Interpretation of a dream about a tree for a single woman: Seeing a tree in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of the presence of a good man. Saleh will be her husband in the future. A green tree full of leaves is evidence of a wealthy husband. As for an unmarried woman who sees a dry tree in her dream, this indicates bad luck and failure in her life. A single woman who sees herself picking fruit from a tree is evidence of a man’s love. A single woman who sees herself planting a tree in a dream indicates that she will live a year full of surprises and happy news. An unmarried woman watering trees in a dream is evidence of how emotionally stable she is. Water in a dream generally indicates safety in reality. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a tree For a married woman, seeing a tree in a dream for a married woman symbolizes a husband in reality. A tree in a dream also indicates pregnancy soon. Seeing a green tree in a dream with many leaves means a life full of happiness, joy, and stability. Interpretation of a dream about a tree for a widow. Seeing a green tree in a widow’s dream is evidence of a second marriage. Seeing a dry tree in a dream is a sign of sadness and loneliness that you face in reality. Interpretation of a dream about a tree for a divorced woman. A divorced woman who sees a tree in a dream is evidence that she will return to her husband again or marry another man and her life will be full of happiness here as well. Interpretation A pregnant woman’s dream of a tree: A green tree in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes the birth of a male child. Seeing a tree in a dream is news of an easy birth for her. Interpretation of a dream
